title: Re-entering a  game after dc and still g etting a warning?
body:
Hopefully I am posting this in the correct place? 

I just finished my ARAM game (we won yay) but I had a few problems logging in. I got to loading screen smoothly but after this my screen went black but I could hear all the noises of the game. I thought that was strange as I couldn't get out of the black game screen to my normal comp desktop doing everything from ult tabbing to going to the log out screen. So I restarted my computer and promptly restarted my LoL and logged back into the game probably 2/3minutes in. Like I said we won, however when I went into the post game screen I had a warning that I wasn't allowed to leave games? Just wondering why I got this message as I re-logged into the game instantly and played the last 15 mins. There is something wrong with my comp/client etc but I dont understand why I got this warning???

replies.body:
>logged back into the game probably 2/3minutes in

This would definitely not be considered to be "leaving a game". This was the in-game time you're talking about, yes?

to be honest it could have been longer, when i did get ingame i was level 6 and i think my team was level 9/10 so i guess it could have been? how long does it count to get a "leaving a game" penalty? like 5 mins?

The threshold is five minutes, yes.

If you were level six when you re-entered, then it was probably far further than five minutes in.
